resources.string: 选择的封面即是在屏幕上显示的。

string-array.name: settings_descriptions
string-array.item: 选择一个白天或夜间主题为整个应用程序使用。
选择配色方案正在屏幕和回放控制。
重新排列的程序的页面顺序。
Customize the way cover art is displayed on the Now Playing screen.
Pick whether you want to use the album art fetching service or display embedded art.
Choose the folders that contain your music. Files in other folders will be ignored.
Rescan your music folders to update your music library.
Set how often your want your music folders to be scanned for new files.
Legal jingo about the app and its components.
Spot a bug, have a feature request, or can\'t figure something out? We\'re here to help.

resources.string: This application uses one or more icons from the Oxygen Icon Theme, which is not affliated with this app in any way. The icons are distributed under the Creative Commons 3.0 ShareALike License. A copy of the license can be obtained here:
doesn\'t seem to be an audio file. Check to make sure that the file extension is set properly.
感谢您下载Duo音乐Player,下面将帮助您使用应用程序,请向左滑动屏幕。
在接下来的对话框中,您将看到您有权访问的文件夹列表。选择文件夹包含音乐,您想添加到您的目录下。
在接下来的对话框中,选择您想要多久您的文件夹自动重新扫描。更高的扫描频率意味着您可能需要等待几分钟才能开始使用这个应用。低扫描频率意味着您可能需要手动重新扫描您的文件夹添加新的音乐。
如果您经常变化的音乐在你的设备上,那么在接下来的对话框选择一个更高的扫描频率。这意味着你的音乐库将保持尽可能的更新,但是你可能需要等待几分钟才能使用应用程序。如果经常不会改变你的音乐库,选择扫描频率较低。
记住,您总是可以手动扫描的新音乐将设置页面一旦应用程序设置。
现在将扫描您的文件夹和播放列表,并首次建立您的音乐库。这比任何后续扫描将需要更长的时间来完成扫描,所以请耐心等待,不要关闭应用程序的运行时。
The file could not be opened. Try rescanning your library.

Duo Music Player needs to rescan your music folders to fully update your music library with the new song tags. Using the app without rescanning may cause stability issues while accessing songs that you just edited. Touch \'Rescan\' to continue.

Your music library needs to be rescanned to display the updated song tags. If you want to edit more tags, you can update after you\'re done editing all your tags. Tap on the \'Rescan Required\' banner at the bottom of your screen once you\'re ready. \n \nTo prevent potential problems, music playback will be disabled until you rescan your library.
Tap here to rescan your library.
你必须重新扫描你的音乐库才能播放音乐，点击屏幕底部的按钮重新扫描。
编辑这张专辑的标签将导致专辑每首歌全部改变了标签，你确定你想要继续吗?
编辑这张专辑的标签将导致专辑每首歌全部改变了标签，你确定你想要继续吗?
An error occurred while saving your tags. Try rescanning your library.
Album art could not be found for this album.
Drag items in the screens list to rearrange their order.
This album doesn\'t have any artwork.
To add items to this playlist, long press on an artist, album, song or genre and tap \'Add to Playlist\'.
This playlist already exists. Choose another name.
The playlist could not be created.
This album is empty. Try rescanning your music library to fix this issue.
This artist doesn\'t have any albums. Try rescanning your library to fix this issue.
Base theme for the entire app.
Customize the order of the main screen pages.
Customize the album art style in the player.
Pick where album art should be retrieved from.
Set how often the music/playlist folders should be scanned.
Send us your comments, bug reports and feature requests.
No playlists found. Try creating a new playlist.
Invalid playlist. Try rescanning your library.
Playlist not found. Try rescanning your library.
The playlist could not be read. Try rebooting your device or rescanning your library.
你确定你要删除这个播放列表？
Type in a new name for the playlist.
Rotate your device to portrait mode to go back to the previous screen.
The playlist could not be queued. Check if the songs in the playlist are valid.
The artist could not be blacklisted.
The album could not be blacklisted.
The song could not be blacklisted.
The equalizer could not be initalized. Try restarting your device.
This artist doesn\'t have any songs.
Equalizer applied to all songs by
Equalizer applied to all songs in
This album doesn\'t have any songs.
The source file could not be read.
The file(s) could not be written to the new location.
To finish this copy operation, long press the destination folder and tap \"Paste\".
You must copy a file or directory to use the Paste operation.
The source and destination folders are the same.
Are you sure you want to delete this file? This operation cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This operation cannot be undone.
To finish this move operation, long press the destination folder and tap \"Move Here\".
The file could not be deleted.
The folder could not be deleted.
Could not play audio file. Try rescanning your library.
The file could not be renamed.
The folder could not be renamed.
You must enter a file name.
You must enter a folder name.
To remove an item from the blacklist, fling it away in either direction.
You are using the BETA version of Jams Music Player. It will expire in
Jams Music Player BETA has expired.
This expiry counter will reset itself when you install an update to the BETA. You\'ll also still get the regular 10 day trial when the final version is released.
You must select at least one music folder to continue.
To add a music folder to your library, check its corresponding checkbox on the left.
This playlist doesn\'t have any songs.
This genre doesn\'t have any songs.

Do you store your music in the cloud? Tap \'Yes\' to import your library from Google Play. Jams will only stream your songs to your device. It will not download them and none of your music on Google Play will be modified.

NOTE: Jams will access your music on Google Play through an unofficial API. This means that Google does not support this app and you may lose access to your music from Jams at any time . Keep in mind that your actual music on Google Play will always stay intact and that Jams will never modify your playlists or music without your permission.
Please enter the username and password for your Google Play Music account. This information will be stored on your device and used to access your songs and playlists.
Unable to sign into Google Play Music. Check your network connection.
Choose Your Google Play Music Account
Downloading song metadata from Google Play Music.
Downloading playlists metadata from Google Play Music.
Sign in to Google Play Music
Signing in to Google Play Music.
Checking if Google Play Music is installed.
Long press on the folder where you want to save the downloaded song.
Type in a file name for the downloaded song. Jams will automatically embed album art and song metadata into the downloaded file.
Select the folder(s) that contain your music by checking the checkboxes on the left. Tapping on a folder will display the folder\'s contents.
Pick how often you want your library to be rescanned for new music. You can always manually rescan from the app too.
Duo音乐Palyer可以将您的谷歌音乐文件添加到您的设备，但是您必须安装官方谷歌播放音乐应用程序使用此功能。
不使用谷歌音乐播放器
Duo音乐Palyer 现在将建立您的音乐库,专辑封面。在此过程中可以随时关闭应用程序。
谷歌既不支持也不赞同Duo音乐Palyer使用谷歌播放音乐服务。Duo音乐Player将访问你的音乐库使用非官方的api。
You must install the official Google Play Music app before you can stream your music with Jams. Do you want to install it now?

Have you set up your selected account in the official Google Music app? Doing so will enable Jams to seamlessly sync your music from the cloud. If you choose not to set up the official Google Play Music app, you will have to manually sync your music every time you update your library.
选择您喜欢的专辑封面。如果您不确定,选择第一个选项。您可以更改这些选项在设置里。
Enter a name and select a label for your new custom library.
Tap an artist to add their songs to this custom library.
Tap a song to add it to this custom library.
Tap an album to add its songs to this custom library.
Tap on an artist to blacklist them (highlighted) or remove them from the blacklist (unhighlighted).
Tap on an album to blacklist it (highlighted) or remove it from the blacklist (unhighlighted).
Tap on a song to blacklist it (highlighted) or remove it from the blacklist (unhighlighted).
Close any other apps that may be playing audio.
Google Play Music is disabled. You can enable it in Settings.
No songs found. You can configure your music folders in Settings.
No artists found. You can configure your music folders in Settings.
No albums found. You can configure your music folders in Settings.
No album artists found. You can configure your music folders in Settings.
No genres found. You can configure your music folders in Settings.
Jams doesn\'t support tag editing for songs on Google Play Music, yet. This feature will be added in a future update.
No albums found. Try selecting another library.
No songs found. Try selecting another library.
No genres found. Try selecting another library.
Drag the scrubbers to select the part of the song you would like to repeat.
Unable to remove song from playlist.
All songs by this artist are stored on your Google Play Music account and cannot be added to a local playlist. Try creating a Google Play Music playlist instead.
All songs in this album are stored on your Google Play Music account and cannot be added to a local playlist. Try creating a Google Play Music playlist instead.
This song is stored on your Google Play Music account and cannot be added to a local playlist. Try creating a Google Play Music playlist instead.
All songs in this genre are stored on your Google Play Music account and cannot be added to a local playlist. Try creating a Google Play Music playlist instead.
Song could not be removed from playlist.
Swipe right to open the navigation drawer.
Libraries allow you to group your music into smaller subcollections. Think about them as playlists on steroids. You can manage custom libraries in Settings.\n\nTouch to dismiss.
All songs in this group are already stored on this device.
Unable to get album art. Check your network connection.

Thanks for using Jams Music Player. Your 7 day trial has expired. To remove this time limit, please upgrade to the full version of Jams. \n\nIf you have already purchased Jams and are still seeing this message, make sure you are signed into the Google account you made the purchase with. Still need help? Give us a yell at jamsmusicplayer@gmail.com.

You are currently using the trial version of Jams. Upgrading to the full version will remove the trial time limit. \n\nIf you have already purchased Jams and are still seeing this message, make sure you are signed into the Google account you made the purchase with. Still need help? Head over to Settings > Contact Us.
Thanks for purchasing Jams! Your trial time limit has been removed.
Oops! There was an issue with the purchase. Please try again later.
Unable to reach Google Play. Please try again.
Press and hold the repeat button to open the Repeat Song Range dialog.
Swipe in either direction to change tracks.
Press and hold the album art to display the song\'s rating and embedded lyrics.
Swipe left or right to change tracks. You can also peek at the next or previous track without changing the current track.
Get Pinned Songs from Official Google Music App
The official Google Play Music app is not installed.
Please wait until other songs have finished being pinned.
Getting pinned songs from the Google Play Music app.
Done getting all pinned songs from Google Play Music.
Music playback will start after the requested songs are finished being pinned.
The equalizer is disabled. You can enable it in Settings.
Unable to gain audio focus. Close any other audio apps and try again.
Pick the animation to display when you swipe tracks in the player screen.
To set the default (starting) folder for Folders view, go to Folders view, long press on a folder and tap \"Set as Default Folder\".
You default folder does not exist. Falling back to root.
is now your default folder for Folders view.
If you are using an HTC device and your volume controls are stuck at max, go to Settings > Equalizer and tap \"Disable\". This is a known issue with the API and is currently being fixed by Google.
Feel free to close the app during this process. Swipe down your notification drawer at any time to check the current progress.
前往这张专辑的艺术家
the next time you play it.
这个主题会在下次重新启动使用
音乐锁屏控制将被禁用在您下次开始播放音乐。
Congratulations! You\'ve won 50% off the upgrade price! Tap \"Upgrade\" to continue.
Sorry, you didn\'t win this time. You can still upgrade to the full version though. Tap \"Upgrade\" to continue.
You must have the Facebook app installed to participate in this promotion.
Oops, your Facebook share post didn\'t go through. Please try again later.
Thanks for sharing! Enjoy your 30% off.

Share Jams Music Player on Facebook and get 30% off your upgrade price!\n \nJust sign in to Facebook, share Jams with your friends using the Facebook Share dialog, and you\'ll instantly get the 30% discount applied to your purchase.
Swipe in from the right bezel on any screen to access the list of songs that are currently being played. You can also access playback controls and the player screen from this drawer.
让我选我的音乐文件夹
No more songs to skip to.
Duo音乐Palyer将在后台继续扫描专辑封面,这个过程完成时会通知您一次。
改变应用程序的主题,颜色,等等。
在浏览器列表和网格视图之间切换。
自定义文件夹视图,显示隐藏文件,默认文件夹。
重建你的音乐库和改变选定的音乐文件夹。
改变你的Google帐户设置播放音乐。
添加、删除和编辑您的自定义标签。
修改专辑封面来源和从互联网下载专辑封面。
修改黑名单艺术家、专辑和歌曲。
配置淡入淡出,耳机插头行动和均衡器切换。
关闭自动切换和选择你关闭应用程序。
关于应用的开放源码许可和联系信息
选择一个夜间或者白天的主题。
选择一个配色方案在您所选择的主题。
选择显示在应用程序启动时的默认浏览器。
